author: Anthony Luta
text:
Day 2 of @QuillandCrow’s poetry challenge and here’s something for “Wicked” #crowcalls #poetry #wicked 

Moving shadows,
Shift the eye,
Round and round,
Until you cry.

You try to run,
From what’s behind.
But you can’t lose,
What’s in your mind.

author: Anthony Luta
text:
Here’s my rendition of “Serpentine” for today’s @QuillandCrow’s prompt. #crowcalls #poetry 

Slither and wrap,
Around the bones,
To climb inside,
Elicits moans.

It finds the head,
From deep within.
Constrict and rind,
Beneath the skin.

author: Anthony Luta
text: So art people. What platform would be the best to sell from? I know a lot of people use Etsy, but I’m trying to stay away from them because of all the fees, and that ridiculous ad gouging they did. #art #bookbinding #books #crafting #craftfairs

author: Anthony Luta
text: This is why you don’t put stickers on books. You ruin them. Thank you so much 👍🏻 https://t.co/37iHa7SzDm

author: Anthony Luta
text: I love how I can do everything right for my credit score, never be late, never use more than half of my credit, etc, butter score is being fucked because of hard looks on my score. Please tell me how that makes sense! #creditscore #makeitmakesense #abolishcreditscores

author: Anthony Luta
text: Do you ever try to talk to people about why a perspective they might still hold onto isn’t the best, and it just feels like you’re talking into the void? Like, they don’t care. Just one mindset and that’s it.

author: Anthony Luta
text: “Health insurance should be tied to employment!” Employer healthcare: $83 biweekly, $1,000 deductible, and $4,500 out of pocket. And that’s good how? I’d pay $5,500 before the insurance would pay everything. This system is broken #insurancereform

author: Anthony Luta
text: Also, can someone explain to me why the only reason my credit score is below 700 is from buying a car? Literally, I have 10 hard hits on it from financing the car. Why does looking at it make it go down? It’s all made up anyway! #abolishcreditscore #creditscore #wortheless
